#summary Roadmap

= Impala 1.0 M1 =

  * Interactive test runner
  * Suite test runner
  * Simple scaffolding, allowing building of new projects. See [GettingStarted Getting Started]
  * Eclipse web application runner (using Jetty)
  * War deployment build
  * Non-war deployment build for Jetty
  * Full refactoring to remove wrinkles in architecture
  
= Impala 1.0 =

  * Service registry API
  * IDE integration (IntelliJ, Netbeans)
  * Better maven support
  * Extensions to !JMX administration capability
  * More documentation
  * More _Whistle and bells_ samples
  * Extensions to automated testing environment
